# Special character patterns

## blank

```
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
```

## blank indicator

```
00000000
00010000
00010000
00010000
00000000
00000000
00000000
```

## vertical label separator

```
00000000
00000000
01010101
00000000
00000000
00000000
```

## "ON" in 2 chars with light background

```
00111110
01100011
01011101
01011101
01100011
01111111
01000001
01111011
01110111
01000001
00111110
00000000
```

## "OFF" in 2 chars

```
00000000
00011100
00100010
00100010
00011100
00000000
00111110
00001010
00000000
00111110
00001010
00000000
```

## "aye" in 2 chars for "Layer"

```
00110010
00101010
00111100

00101000
00011110

00101010

00000000
```

```

```

```
00100001
00100001
00000000
```
